line_1: It is the voice of a tempestuous ocean!
line_2: It is the flood of human life in motion!

line_1: Hast thou, on the troubled ocean,
line_2: Where the waves, with wild commotion,

line_1: The woods, the fields, the ocean,
And bathe their glittering foreheads in the ocean.
line_2: The stars rush headlong in the wild commotion

line_1: Oh! that in this rolling ocean
line_2: And obey'd my heart's warm motion
But what shall smooth that keener motion,

line_1: They toss'd the poor parson souse into the ocean.
line_2: To lighten the ship, and conclude their devotion,
With many an oar in motion,
